text: Kristaq Dhamo (20 April 1933 â€“ 14 August 2022) was an Albanian actor and movie director. His 1958 movie Tana was shown at the 1st Moscow International Film Festival. His career lasted from 1958 until 1987. He was born in Fier, Albania. Dhamo died on 14 August 2022 at the age of 89. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Albanian actors Category:Movie directors
title: Kristaq Dhamo
